title: Lincoln
description: You’re mommy’s little bumblebee.Mommy’s little bumblebee.He is the king of Hawthorne Asylum.I’m the fool that let him in. He thinks he has me wrapped around his finger. That I’ll wake-up one morning and forgive his ultimate betrayal.Think again, Hannibal Sketcher.Join my group on FB (Tempnation) for updates/teasers. ♥
author: Tempi Lark
